remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 适配器集支持名为的概念*辅助用户界面*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 辅助用户界面可供需要在相同的方式，基于 Windows 的应用程序会显示对话框中显示的 UI 中，附加屏幕的控件。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way that a Windows-based application shows dialog boxes. 有关辅助用户界面的详细信息，请参阅[适配器集功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7)文档。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see the [Adapter Sets Functionality](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7) documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载将默认值设置为的回发类型。This overload sets the default value for the postback type to . 如果`mapToSoftKey`参数设置为`true`，文本的`softkeyLabel`显示参数。If the `mapToSoftKey` parameter is set to `true`, the text of the `softkeyLabel` parameter is displayed. 下表显示了用于的回发类型`postBackType`参数。The following table shows the postback types used for the `postBackType` argument. |类型Type|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||在回发包含一个名称和编码的参数。The postback contains a name and an encoded argument.| ||在回发包含用来提交窗体、 通常 _EVENTTARGET 和命令的控件。The postback contains the control used to submit the form, typically an _EVENTTARGET and a command.| ||在回发包含一个名称和变量的引用。The postback contains a name and a variable reference.| ||在回发包含一个名称和参数。The postback contains a name and an argument.|

span.span: The secondary UI mode for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 适配器集支持名为的概念*辅助用户界面*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 辅助用户界面可供需要为基于 Windows 的应用程序中的对话框相同的方式显示的 UI 中，附加屏幕的控件。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way as a dialog box in a Windows-based application. 有关辅助用户界面的详细信息，请参阅[适配器集功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7)。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see [Adapter Sets Functionality](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7).
